member.summary: Gets current site name (retrieved from domain accessed).

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTSecurityInvoker.AuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets the type of authentication which should be used to authenticate REST service. Default value is basic authentication ("basic" constant). Other option is forms authentication ("forms" constant).

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTSecurityInvoker.RESTServiceEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the REST service is enabled (in settings).

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTSecurityInvoker.DocumentAccessReadOnly
member.summary: Indicates whether the access to the documents is read-only. If true, only GET reguests are allowed.

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTSecurityInvoker.ObjectAccessReadOnly
member.summary: Indicates whether the access to the objects is read-only. If true, only GET reguests are allowed.

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTSecurityInvoker.ServiceTypeEnabled
member.summary: Gets the type of the service which is enabled (0 = Everything, 1 = Only objects, 2 = Only documents).

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTSecurityInvoker.IsSynchronous
member.summary: Always true - we need synchronous behaviour for authentication.

member.summary: Gets current base uri of the REST service

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTService.CurrentSiteName
member.summary: Gets current site name (retrieved from domain accessed).

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTService.CurrentSite
member.summary: Gets current site object recieved from the domain.

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTService.CurrentUserName
member.summary: Gets current user name recieved from auth cookie.

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTService.CurrentUser
member.summary: Gets current user object recieved from auth cookie.

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTService.AllowedObjectTypes
member.summary: Gets the list of allowed object types separated by semicolon. Empty string means all object types are allowed.

member.name: P:CMS.RESTService.RESTService.AllowedDocumentTypes
member.summary: Gets the list of allowed document types separated by semicolon. Empty string means all document types are allowed.
